Description: Papyrus; Hieratic text; recto: blank; verso: administrative text.
Curator's comments: Joined with EA 10435. The frame number is (accidently) put on the verso. Bibliography: F. Hagen, An Ancient Egyptian Literary Text in Context; The Instruction of Ptahhotep (OLA 218; Leuven; Peeters), 2012, 131-42. The literary text of this manuscript is available on T.L.A. (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381274) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381274)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: copydex self adhesive carpet tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A
